Your Mentor for Mastering Immigration Appeals

On-Demand Expert Support for Your Immigration Law Firm

If you're navigating the intricacies of immigration appeals, you know these cases demand specialized expertise and resilience. Lory, a former Board of Immigration Appeals member and a dedicated coach, offers more than just answers to legal questions—she provides the mentorship you need to confidently tackle high-stakes appeals yourself.

With a unique approach that prioritizes both your professional growth and well-being, Lory helps you develop appellate skills while avoiding the isolation and burnout many immigration attorneys face in this difficult field. Together, you’ll build a foundation for sustainable practice, equipping you not only for today’s cases but for a fulfilling career in immigration law.

The support you deserve, the expertise you need

Lory offers free consultations to assess your needs. With flexible rates and a comprehensive coaching skill set, you will have the type of holistic professional support you’ve always wished for. Whether you’re new to appeals or looking to sharpen your skills, Lory’s expert mentorship will empower you to handle even the toughest cases with confidence.

Why Lory?

  • Former BIA Board Member

    As a well-known dissenter in many influential opinions during her years on the Board of Immigration Appeals, Lory has years of rare inside legal knowledge and that she puts to work to support you and your clients.

  • Immigration Innovator & Consultant

    Lory stays up-to-date with the state of immigration law and policy through ongoing projects devoted to legal research, the intersection of law and technology, and expanding access to legal services for immigrants.

  • Trainer & Certified Coach

    In addition to her immigration work, Lory is a a certified coach with a passion for empowering attorneys to embrace their full potential, transforming personal challenges into strengths that benefit their clients, practice, and personal growth.

About Me

I’m Lory Rosenberg, and my passion is helping immigration attorneys unlock their full potential—both professionally and personally. With a deep commitment to social justice and equality, I’ve spent my career advocating for fairness and empowering others to do the same. I believe that great legal representation goes beyond technical skill; it’s about compassion, integrity, and the courage to stand up for what’s right. Having grown up in the Midwest with a strong sense of justice, my path has always been guided by a desire to make a real difference in the world. I work with attorneys who are navigating complex immigration appeals, not just to teach them the mechanics of the law, but to inspire them to pursue excellence in all areas of their practice. I mentor them on setting meaningful goals, finding balance, and cultivating resilience in the face of challenges. I’m here to help you grow, not only as an attorney but as a whole person—so you can offer the best to your clients and make a lasting impact on the lives you touch.
